Posts.Content: Junip wrote: Hi Ladies,  I have an appointment to see my OBGYN on Thursday due to a recurrent boil on the under part of my right breast.  About 7 years ago I was stung on the breast by a bee while leaning over the side of my pool and subsequently developed cellulitis from it. Twice in the last two years, I found a bright red patch on the under part of my breast, as well as a pimple looking thing. The red was warm to touch but faded away and did not return for a year. Then it appeared again during my pregnancy, and has not returned for 2 years. However, I have gotten this boil type thing in that area and I was able to squeeze pus out of it last week and again last night. It is purplish-red and seems infected. I had gone to my OB for it in the winter concerned about IBC and they told me no, it was not IBC.  I had a baseline mamo and then a diagnostic one due to a gland there were concerned with and the results found no evidence of carcinoma. But I am still concerned about IBC. I guess my question would be, could it present with a boil-like thing that oozes?  I appreciate all of your help. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Recurrent boil on breast? Junip Jen011
